channel.description: Recent content in OMR on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Download Optical Mark Recognition C# DLL | Aspose.OMR API
item.description: Support Forum Download Aspose.OMR to Read Human-marked Data Open NuGet Package Manager within the Microsoft Visual Studio®, search for Aspose.OMR and install. You may also use the following command within the Package Manager Console. For the detailed instructions please visit the Installation documentation page. Release Notes Download PM> Install-Package Aspose.OMR   Product Page | Docs | Demos | API Reference | Examples | Blog | Search | Free Support | Temporary License | EULA

item.description: Aspose.OMR for .NET 23.7 (DLLs only) Download  Support Forum  File Details Downloads: 1 File Size: 130.67MB Date Added: 7/7/2023 Release Noteshttps://releases.aspose.com/omr/net/release-notes/2023/aspose-omr-for-net-23-7-0-release-notes/ DescriptionThis ZIP file contains only the Aspose.OMR for .NET assemblies. The assemblies are the same as in the MSI installer of the product of the same version. Download this if you want to use Aspose.OMR without the MSI installer, i.
